div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1821 Dzungary, NW Sin Kiang, China?, (340) 1918 Burial: 3rd cent. B.C. (M) Contents: 16 AE Panticapaeum: 15 Phanagoria: 1 Disposition: Tomsk University Biehl, BlM 1923, pp. 445-9, illus. No other Greek coins have been found so far east; the hd. made its appearance in Tomsk, c. 1250 km. from the reported find place; the dirt on the coins was said to be similar to that on the coins found at Olbia. Clearly, the find place is not beyond suspicion
